item.title: Model corruption, please help
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

Hey, I decided to do a recolor of spined armor. (Please don’t flame because of the fact I recolored it). I have only added one, the plate body/body. I am pretty sure I did everything correct, but i think that there may be something wrong with my ints for the item. So, added my model into my models folder in my client. I made the model numbers 9800 for the drop/inventory model, and 9801 for the male/female wield model. I corrected my ints as far as I know, and before i put them into class8.java I went in game and wrote this:

add model 9800 add model 9801

It said the models were added successfully so that would not be the problem. Then I added my ints to class8.java. This is them:

if(i == 14789) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 9800; class8.anInt181 = 1140; class8.anInt190 = 460; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = 4; class8.anInt165 = 9801; class8.anInt200 = 9801; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Sagen Platebody"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A dark, intimidating piece of armor.".getBytes(); }

Not sure if there is a problem with my ints, but I think that is were the problem is coming from.
Then I went in game and added it to my inventory. My game froze and didn’t unfreeze. It said this in my client runner (not compiler) after my client froze:

Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 62459 at Class30_Sub2_Sub2.method421(Class30_Sub2_Sub2.java:328) at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:222) at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:136) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:7214) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:7035) at client.method105(client.java:9836) at client.method36(client.java:2150) at client.method102(client.java:9281) at client.method9(client.java:10450) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:127) at client.run(client.java:5387) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

If anyone can see any problem, I would really, really appreciate their time and help.

Thanks a lot.
~~ 14-08

Read full topic
